description:
Luffy and Zoro find themselves locked in battle with their latest foes, but Nami`s knowledge of the sea may be the key to escaping this scrum alive!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: - Saga dell`ambizione di Z - Un grandioso piano di fuga
L’ambition de Z : La grande évasion !
Z no Yabou Hen: Kesshi no Dai Dasshutsu Sakusen!
Z`s Ambition! A Great and Desperate Escape Plan!
Zの野望編 決死の大脱出作戦!
Амбиции Z! Отчаянный план большого побега!
طموح زد! خطّة هروب عظيمة ويائسة!
